name: Login Logout Shortcode Simple
author: Clodoaldo Xavier Gomes

sections.description: Protect your pages by just adding the shortcode [login-logout-shortcode-simple]. No need to know programming. You can now choose which levels of users can access protected content. Install the new version and configure your preferences.
sections.installation:
• Install the plugin from the ‘Plugins’ section in your dashboard (Go to Plugins -> Add New -> Search and search for Login Logout Shortcode Simple).
  • Alternatively, you can download the plugin from the repository. Unzip it and upload it to the plugins folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation).
  • Activate it through the ‘Plugins’ section.
  • Use the Login Logout Shortcode Simple menu to configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Revision

0.1
